data.description: Radity is a software company that provides solutions for the insurance sector. I will be working on the frontend side of the company. I use React, TypeScript, Material UI, and Context Api on the frontend side.
I participated in the React Bootcamp organized by CicekSepeti and Patika.dev. I learned the basics of JavaScript, HTML, CSS, React.
It was my summer internship. I learned Java SE, Java EE, and Spring Framework.
I studied Computer Engineering at Kocaeli University. I learned C, Java, Data Structures, Algorithms, Database, Operating Systems, and Computer Networks.
